LanguageData.glwCompleteStartupLetterDesc: Your launch window closes in {0}.\n\nIf you do not launch before the end of the launch window, then you will have to complete the startup sequence again.
LanguageData.glwMissedLaunchLetterDesc: You have missed your launch window. The grav engine will now need to cool off for {0} before you can initiate the startup sequence again.
LanguageData.glwMissedLaunchLetterDesc2: You have missed your launch window. You will need to complete the startup sequence again before you can launch.
LanguageData.glwEjectedLaunchLetterDesc: You have aborted a gravlaunch startup sequence. The grav engine will now need to cool off for {0} before you can initiate the startup sequence again.
LanguageData.glwLaunchTimersResetDesc: Your grav engine has finished cooling down. You can now initiate the startup sequence again.
LanguageData.glwEmergencyStartupDesc:
An emergency startup has instantly prepared your grav engine for launch.

If you launch during this window, then the quality of the GravLaunch will be much lower than normal, and the post-landing grav engine cooldown will take much longer.

If you choose not to launch during this window, then your next GravLaunch will proceed as normal. However, the cooldown phase after this launch window expires will be much longer than normal.

Regardless of whether or not you launch, you will not be able to use Emergency Startup again for another {0}.
